name: Tumis buncis udang
steps: Saute ground spices, add a little water and cook until fragrant.
Add the snap beans and sliced ​​green chilies, then add the sugar, salt and seasoning, mix well.
Finally add the prawns, cook until the prawns change color and are cooked. Lift and serve.
author: Mufaridah Fauziah

name: Sambal Pecel
steps: Fry or roast peanuts until cooked. Remove and drain then let stand until cold.
Grind the peanuts with a mortar, grinder or meat grinder until smooth. Put it in a container.
Subtle Seasoning: Fry the chilies, garlic and kencur until wilted. Lift and drain.
Grind or mash with palm sugar and lime leaves until smooth.
Mix the Smooth Seasoning with ground peanuts, tamarind then stir until completely blended and blended.
Pecel seasoning is ready to be used for boiled vegetable sauce.
author: Odilia WS

name: Sayur Asam
steps: Bring the water to a boil, add the corn and boil briefly. Then add the other vegetables.
Cook the vegetables until half cooked, then add the ground spices, galangal, bay leaves, salt and seasoning.
Cook vegetables until cooked, then serve.
Goreng cabai, tomat, dan bawang hingga layu.
Then puree and season with salt and sugar.
author: Kananda Budiswono

name: Sambal Matah Bali
steps: Mix well the red bird's eye chilies, shallots, lemongrass, lime leaves, grilled shrimp paste, salt, and lime. Squeeze until the ingredients wither. set aside.
Heat the coconut oil, immediately pour it into the chili mixture. Stir well. Serve.
author: Endeus Makan

name: Sambal Ayam Goreng Khalasan khas jogja
origin: Jogja, Province of Special Region of Yogyakarta
steps: Heat the oil, sauté the ground spices and sliced ​​chilies until cooked and fragrant. Lift.
Put it in a saucepan, pour coconut milk and add bay leaves and galangal.
Cook over medium heat until boiling.
Enter the tolo beans, krecek and tofu. Cook over medium heat until the beans are soft and the flavors meld.
Add thick coconut milk and red chilies. Cook over low heat until the spices are absorbed and the gravy is thick and oily. Turn off the fire.
author: Odilia WS

name: Bubu SumSum
origin: Jogja, Province of Special Region of Yogyakarta
steps: Dissolve water with condensed milk.
Mix rice flour, with coconut milk, salt
Add the milk solution
Cook until thickened while stirring
Cook brown sugar, pandan and water
Add condensed milk
Serve the Bubur Sumsum porridge with brown sugar sauce
author: Khansa Iskandar
